item.title: Mapping Hospitals
item.description: Mapping Hospitals My goal was to build a highly interactive, informative, and easy-to-understand map of hospitals in the United States. I went through a lot of methods to create this final product, but landed on a combination of Shiny, ggplot2, and plotly to create my final map.
